content: दैशिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [देशेन निर्वृत्तं तस्येदं वा-ठञ्] {@--1@} Local, provincial. {@--2@} National, belonging to the whole country. {@--3@} Belonging or having reference to space; <ls>Bhāṣā P. 120.</ls> {@--4@} Acquainted with any place. {@--5@} Teaching, pointing, directing, showing. --कः {@--1@} A teacher, preceptor. {@--2@} A guide.
